title: Todo AI Chatbot Tools
description: OpenAI-compatible tool definitions for todo operations

function.name: add_task
function.description: Add a new task to the user's todo list. Use when user wants to create a new task.

title.description: The title/name of the task to add

description.description: Optional description or details for the task

function.name: list_tasks
function.description: List the user's tasks. Can filter by completion status.

filter.description: Filter tasks by status. 'all' returns everything, 'pending' returns incomplete, 'completed' returns done tasks.

function.name: complete_task
function.description: Mark a task as complete/done. Identify task by position number or title.

task_identifier.description: Task position number (e.g., '1', '2') or partial title match

function.name: delete_task
function.description: Delete/remove a task from the list. Requires confirmation. Identify by position or title.

task_identifier.description: Task position number (e.g., '1', '2') or partial title match

confirmed.description: Whether user has confirmed deletion. If false, ask for confirmation first.

function.name: update_task
function.description: Update an existing task's title or description.

task_identifier.description: Task position number (e.g., '1', '2') or partial title match
